title: Attacking Active Directory - Kerberoast Attack
snippet: Kerberoast Attack OverviewKerberoast is an Active Directory attack that first presented by Tim Medin in 2014 at Derbycon 4.0. snippet: Token Impersonation Attack OverviewTokens can be thought of as cookies for a computer.
